name: Bit Social – Auto Post Scheduler & Poster for Blog to Social Media Share
author: Bit Social Auto Poster & Scheduler - by Bit Apps

sections.description:
Best Auto Social Media Poster plugin for WordPress. It helps you to share your WordPress post on social media platform automatically. You can set schedule for each social media.

Every single wp post share many platform like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and manage theme manually is very difficult. Here’s come Bit Social, this plugin make your life easy and save your time. You can set schedule for each social media platform and it will share your post automatically.

User can manage all social media platform from one place.

‚ôªÔ∏é How does this plugin work?

This plugin acts as a bridge between platforms and WordPress post. First, user need create a schedule for platform and it will share wp post automatically according to schedule time and date. User send wp post to multiple platform at a time. User can also set sleep time for each platform.

Key Features:

  1. Create schedule.
  2. Share post on Facebook.
  3. Field Mapping & Custom value.
  4. Sleep time.
  5. Wp post filter.
  6. Create Platform group.
  7. Show Specific Log.
  8. WooCommerce product post

Some use cases below for more understanding about this plugin

  1. User want to share Wp post on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram. User can create schedule for each platform and it will share wp post automatically according to schedule time and date.

  2. User want to share one date to another date. User can filter wp post by date and it will share only those post which is created between selected date.

  3. User can delay post share time for each platform by setting sleep time.

Key Benefits of Plugin :

  1. Save time: User can share wp post on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram platform at a time. It will save user time.

  2. Easy to use: User can create schedule for each platform and it will share wp post automatically according to schedule time and date.

  3. No coding required: It is really simple and easy to use. No coding required.

sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. From the WordPress Admin Panel, click on Plugins => Add New.
  3. Click on Upload, so you can directly upload your plugin zip file.
  4. Use the browse button to select the plugin zip file that was downloaded, and then click on Install Now.
  5. Once installed, click ‚ÄúActivate‚Äù.
